=Hi, I completely understand you need pricing! Since BMW service costs vary by model/service,
please book a quick call with our specialist for accurate estimates: 
https://calendly.com/bimmerplacellc/new-meeting
Reply STOP to opt out.

parameters.content:
Bimmer Palace Complete Automation Suite - DocumentationSystem Overview
A comprehensive lead management ecosystem for BMW service business with 4 interconnected workflows handling lead capture, response tracking, email nurturing, and WhatsApp follow-ups.Workflow 1: Main Lead Management & Response Tracking
Purpose: Central hub that captures leads and tracks all responses across channelsCore Functions:

Lead Capture: Fillout form webhook â†’ Google Sheets storage
Dual Channel Launch: Triggers both email and WhatsApp workflows
Response Monitoring:

Gmail trigger (every minute) for email replies
WhatsApp webhook for incoming messages


Smart Matching: Links responses back to original leads
Auto-Responses: Price inquiry detection triggers booking messages
Key Features:

Message classification (pricing, general, complaint, etc.)
Updates "Replied" status to prevent duplicate follow-ups
Handles both email and WhatsApp response tracking in one workflow

System Integration & Flow
Lead Journey:

Form Submission â†’ Main workflow logs to Google Sheets
Immediate Response â†’ Both email and WhatsApp welcome messages
Parallel Sequences â†’ 4-email + 4-WhatsApp campaigns run simultaneously
Response Monitoring â†’ Any reply stops both sequences
Smart Responses â†’ Price inquiries trigger booking-focused replies

Data Management:

Central Database: Single Google Sheet tracks everything
Deduplication: "Replied" field prevents sequence overlap
Message Classification: AI-powered categorization for targeted responses
Multi-channel Tracking: Email, WhatsApp, and form data in one place

Reply Intelligence:

Email: Gmail API monitors for responses
WhatsApp: Webhook captures incoming messages
Classification: Keywords determine message type (pricing, positive, complaint, etc.)
Auto-Responses: Price inquiries get Calendly booking messages


Key Strengths
Comprehensive Coverage:

Captures leads across multiple touchpoints
Maintains engagement through two primary channels
Tracks all customer interactions centrally

Smart Automation:

Prevents message fatigue with reply detection
Personalizes responses based on message type
Respectful opt-out handling

Business Impact:

Converts form fills into booked consultations
Maintains professional brand presence
Reduces manual follow-up work
Provides detailed interaction analytics

Technical Sophistication:

Multi-workflow coordination
Real-time response tracking
Message classification AI
Mobile-optimized content

Result: A complete lead-to-booking automation system that nurtures prospects across email and WhatsApp while intelligently stopping outreach when customers respond, maximizing conversion while maintaining professionalism.
